Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2008 08:14PM sunshine2003 wrote: Sorry to hear this - it seems something we will forever live with - the re-checks.  I do find that I have a lot of stuff that I believe is linked to the long-term use of aromasin.....stomach (new fat belly), thinning hair (never a problem for you) and sore joints from time to time - I believe it's truly an awful drug and I'm so ready to be done with it - although I guess thankful it's been keeping me healthy.  I hope this all comes out well for you - may loving hands keep you warm and supported through the tests. Janet
Posts.Title: Tests needed wallan kimf

Posts.Content: Dec 22, 2008 12:23PM sunshine2003 wrote: Hi Wendy - had that bleeding/spotting issue also - often happened after going to the toilet., while nvolved in vigorous exercise - so............I've dropped coffee from my diet because it was acting like a laxative in me - which then caused hemoroids- problem was solved. Hope yours is as simple Janet
